'''16w43a''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.11]], released on October 27, 2016.<ref name="blogpost">{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161128234951/https://mojang.com/2016/10/minecraft-snapshot-16w43a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 16w43a|website=Mojang|date=October 27, 2016|author=Maria}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[Woodland mansion]]s'''
* Have a new room with lava encased in glass and obsidian, with a diamond block in the middle.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Death messages]]'''
* ''"<player|mob> was squished too much"'', when suffocated due to the <code>maxEntityCramming</code> [[gamerule]].

'''[[Evocation fangs]]'''
* Added the {{nbt|compound|Owner}} tag.

== Changes ==
'''[[Fishing rod]]s'''
* Now cast out or reel in when right clicking on fences.

'''[[Loot table]]s'''
* Villagers, vexes and ender dragons are now able to draw from their own loot tables.

'''[[Observer]]s'''
* Arrows on the top and bottom sides now point towards its output.

'''[[Vex]]es'''
* Can now cross nether and end portals, and move in water.

'''[[Redstone]]'''
* Air is no longer given a block update when a redstone current travels through it.
